name: ProscenicHome
0:
”alexa, turn on proscenic smart device”
”alexa, turn off proscenic smart device”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Interact with proscenic smart device by Alexa. 
To get started, make sure you have "ProscenicHome" and "Alexa" APP ready for operation in your phone. Then, you just need to enable the "ProscenicHome" smart home skill by clicking on the “Enable” button at the top of this screen. Once the skill is enabled, you will be asked to link with your "ProscenicHome" account. 

When all connection is ready built, you can simply proscenic smart device by saying: 

"alexa, turn on proscenic smart device."
"alexa, turn off proscenic smart device."

You must change the words "proscenic smart device" to your device name.

Commands compatible with connected all Proscenic smart iot devices.

Tips: you must firstly bind your humidifier with “ProscenicHome” APP to use the Alexa voice control. 
Please make sure to use your “ProscenicHome” account to link Alexa skill. 
If you have any questions, feel free to contact us: service@proscenic.tw
